Room.Name: Leviathan Drive/Netherworld Lane Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Netherworld Lane and Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Leviathan Drive runs north and south from one end of town to the other. Most notably, Leviathan runs on the west side of most of the major parks and natural facilities. Much of this land was set aside by the town to preserve the natural beauty of the land without giving up the protection of the City Walls. Netherworld Lane gets its name because it passes along the north side of the eerie Necropolis, located a block to the west.
